name: The Sevan Podcast
what_you_do: The Sevan Podcast features unedited interviews and conversations with a variety of interesting people, including authors and UFC fighters.
who_you_serve: The podcast serves a broad audience interested in diverse conversations, particularly fans of CrossFit and fitness enthusiasts.
bio: Sevan Matossian is a former head of media for CrossFit Inc. and host of the official CrossFit Podcast.
business_focus: The Sevan Podcast features unedited interviews and conversations with a variety of interesting people, including authors and UFC fighters.
